Streamable - NYC

============

Streamable (https://streamable.com) is a new video platform that makes it super easy to upload and share videos. No intrusive ads, no comments, and no signup required. Some perks:

- Small, tight-knit team pushing daily to millions of users

- Competitive salary, full benefits, and generous equity grants

- Awesome location in the center of Williamsburg, Brooklyn NY

- Higher engineer-to-user ratio than any of the major social networks

============

We're looking for a software engineer that is comfortable working in a modern stack (Python/Backbone/Redis/Nginx). Bonus points if you have prior experience with FFmpeg.

Please contact me directly at armen@streamable.com.
